column2: ENGLISH
With Death of [fromfromfrom.GetTitledFirstName], unfilling his slayer oath, it has fallen to you to retake the oath...

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]! 

As members of [Root.Society.GetName] we must always be ready and willing to craft for our kin. To prove your skill, your client [client_target.GetTitledFirstName] – has requested an experienced smith's assistance in crafting an item! God's Speed and good luck. You shall find [client_target.GetHerHim] in [client_target.Location.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]

Hail, [Root.GetSocietyRank]! 

As members of [Root.Society.GetName] we must always be ready and willing to craft for our kin. You shall find [client_target.GetHerHim] in [client_target.Location.GetName].

Signed, [From.GetTitledFirstName]

column3: [Root.Society.GetName]My fellow members of [Root.Society.GetName] have long been wondering when I will choose a focus for my rune magic. There are those who live to honor Valaya, those that pride themselves with Grungni, while others prefer the more theoretic side The Thungni... Then there is also the warlike Grimnir practice...

'Da boyz around 'da Kamp talk that a great crafta i'z livin in [neighbor_province.GetName]. Maybyz I needz da send in boyz to fetch 'im [smith.GetManWoman] to my kamp to see [smith.GetHerHis] skilz for m'self. If [smith.GetSheHe] somehuw impress me, i wilz force him to crafta me ze item.

I couldda use sum of da new stuf, Right?
I need za new stufz.
I want'z slasha powa! Make me da Choppa!

I want'z zem 'ard arma, to propa protec me' mussels.

[From.GetSheHeCap] introduced [From.GetHerselfHimself] as '[From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]' and gestured towards [From.GetHerHis] numerous assistants, who all carried examples of [From.GetHerHis] work. 'Does my [Root.GetTitle] have anything special in mind?'
Order da best [From.GetWeaponsmithWeaponGreenskin].

It haz been cupla de weeks since i ordered [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] to get me' da [From.GetWeaponsmithWeaponGreenskin], but he seemz strangely been walking with dat himself around da kamp...

Apprentice Runesmith

Each Master Runesmith teaches the fundamentals of fire and forge to young members of his family, selecting the most talented to become Apprentice Runesmiths. While selection is a great honour, it means long years of study and service to his master in the creation of more complicated runes.
Craft an item for
Prepare crafting an item for
Runesmiths Guild

The ancient Guild of Runesmiths is one of the oldest and most respected institutions in all of Karaz Ankor. According to legend, its origins stretch back to the days of Grungni, the great Ancestor God of Mining, Master of the Forge and Lord of the Runes. The Runesmiths Guild claims descent from Grungni's son. For this reason, the Runesmiths sometimes refer to themselves as the Clan of Thungni, however they are not the only clan to claim descent from Grungni or his many sons.

§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! has a Quest for you to craft an item for §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!
You have been tasked with crafting an item for a Dawi lord.

To complete this mission, you need to §Gright-click§! on the portrait of your target and choose to §YBegin Crafting§! for them. If the crafting is successful, you will receive §Y[Root.Society.GetCurrency]§!. However, if you steal or fail to craft in time, §Kyou will lose currency§!. Should you go into negative currency, you will be §KDemoted§!
